body: Hi Giuseppe, I checked the attached file but Rhino geometries are not internalized. DecomposeHBZone will only work for HBZones and not Honeybee surfaces. If you download the new release from the last week you can set up glazingMaterial when you add the glazing to the surface. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2Tkrz8bmcYhgOAh7dYl6xbG0hkQvM2oHcHCzGMimmk-nRJZgk-guRHEUAJ2jbMVGtafR8KE9kyOJH6db1smIVSdzjBulKtga/glazingMaterial.png) Cheers, Mostapha
